mapper.select: select SI.DMND_NO AS dmndNo, SI.SR_NO AS srNo, S1.SYS_NM AS sysNm, T.TASK_SE_NM AS taskSeNm, SD.TTL AS ttl, M.FLNM AS flnm, SI.BGNG_YMD AS bgngYmd, SI.END_YMD AS endYmd, S2.STTS_NM AS sttsNm from SR_INFORMATION SI, SR_DEMAND SD, TASK T, MEMBERS M, SYSTEMS S1, STATUS S2 where SD.DMND_NO = SI.DMND_NO AND SD.TASK_SE_CD = T.TASK_SE_CD AND SD.CUST_ID = M.MEMBER_ID AND S1.SYS_CD = SD.SYS_CD AND S2.STTS_CD = SD.STTS_CD
